MPOS MANUAL

Menu Panel

ID Field - Will take the ID of the employee

Password Field - Will take the password of the user

IF login is successful  a panel to choose which machine to log based on the registered machines in the database that is currently available will output

Login logic - Will execute a query to the database to retrieve the password and role of the employee

MPOS ROLES PERMISSIONS

Access

CRUD

Roles

Full

Yes

Admin

Limited

Limited

Staff

Limited

No

Employee

Roles

  • Admin
  • Staff
  • Employee

Admin

  • Has access to the dashboard
  • Has access to the POS Terminal

Staff

  • Has limited access to the dashboard
  • Has access to the POS terminal

Employee

  • Has access to the POS terminal

MPOS DASHBOARD

  • Transactions
  • Reports
  • Items
  • Suppliers
  • Staff &
  • Admin
  • POS Machine
  • History

MPOS DASHBOARD

Transactions - Panel for viewing all transactions made in POS terminal

  • Can Search through transactions either of the following columns:
  • OrderID of the transactions
  • ID of the Employee
  • Products quantity bought
  • User name of the Employee
  • Device name of the machine
  • PaymentMethod the method used for paying
  • Status status of the transactions done
  • Can Delete Transactions by date registered

Reports - Panel for viewing all transaction related sales data

  • Sales
  • The total count of sales
  • The total amount of sales (Including Voided)
  • Successful Sales
  • The total amount Successful of sales
  • The total amount Successful of sales
  • Successful Sales
  • The total amount Successful of sales
  • The total amount Successful of sales
  • Void Sales
  • The total amount Void of sales
  • The total amount Void of sales
  • Revenue
  • The total amount of Revenue on sales
  • Total Revenue is calculated by TotalCost - TotalAmount
  • Total Cost
  • The total amount of Cost on sales
  • Total Cost is calculated by TotalCost per item * Quantity

  • Files
  • Opens the main folder of output of MPOS
  • Receipts Folder
  • Invoices Folder
  • Save
  • Creates a PDF invoice of selected summary of transactions
  • Encrypted PDF
  • Password = CurrentUserName + currentMachineName

Items - Panel for Operations relating to Items

  • Add
  • Opens a panel to add Items
  • ProductID ID for the Item to be added
  • ProductName Name for the Item to be added
  • DefaultQuantity Quantity for the Item to be added
  • UnitPrice Price of the Item to be added
  • UnitCost TotalCost of the Item to be added
  • ProductCategory Category for the Item to be added
  • ProductSupplier Supplier for the selected Item is selected based on the registered Suppliers
  • ProductDescription Small introduction for identifying the selected Item to be added
  • Delete
  • Deletes a registered Item based on its ID
  • Update
  • Updates the selected Item based on the new values entered

Suppliers - Panel for Operations relating to Suppliers

  • Add
  • Opens a panel to add Supplier
  • SupplierIDID for the Supplier to be added
  • SupplierName Name for the Supplier to be added
  • SupplierEmail Email of the  Supplier to be added
  • SupplierItems The amount of Items being supplied by the adding Supplier        
  • Delete
  • Deletes a registered Supplier based on its ID
  • Update
  • Updates the selected Supplier based on the new values entered

Staff & Admin- Panel for Operations relating to Employee

  • Add
  • Opens a panel to add Employee
  • EmployeeName Name for the Employee to be added
  • EmployeePassword Password for the Employee to be added will be used for verification in login
  • Delete
  • Deletes a registered Employee based on its ID
  • Update
  • Updates the selected Employee based on the new values entered

Machines- Panel for Operations relating to machines

  • Add
  • Opens a panel to add machines
  • MachineID ID for the Employee to be added
  • MachineName Name for the Employee to be added
  • MachineLocation Location for the machine to be added
  • MachineType Type for the machine to be added
  • Computer is a machine only Admin & Staff can access
  • Cash Register is mostly Used for Employee as POS
  • MachineStatus Status of the machine to be added
  • Delete
  • Deletes a registered machines based on its ID
  • Update
  • Updates the selected machines based on the new values entered

History - Panel for viewing history made by users

  • Clear
  • Admin only button must enter password to delete history

POS TERMINAL

Terminal - Added Orders are placed on this panel

  • Process
  • If Orders are not empty will calculate total price
  • Can input discount amount
  • Can input Tax amount based on the dropdown choices
  • If Current Orders isn't voided
  • Payment will be enabled to proceed
  • Payment Panel
  •  Select the Payment Method using the dropdown choices
  • Input the payment received from the customer
  • Count Button will calculate the change of the customer if applicable
  • Upon Completion can pick whether to create a receipt or not
  • Receipts are outputted in the Receipts Folder
  • Will Update the quantity of the Orders Bought
  • Void
  • If Orders are not empty will void current Orders
  • Will update the transaction and empty the terminal
  • Transactions
  • Will take to the Transactions table

Products - Lists of registered Items will be displayed here

  • Add
  • Will list of all registered Items as a choice
  • If the selected Item quantity is not 0 will be able to add the Item
  • Will be asked to enter the quantity of the current Item
  • Upon completion will be added to the Terminal                

Transactions - Lists of all Transactions made by the machine

  • Refresh
  • Will Refresh and Update the lists of transactions made

Settings - All Information related to the machine and the current user

  • Refresh
  • Will Display all sales made logged machine and user
